font.p:
As part of the Brown University Programming Languages Team, I have contributed to the Pyret programming language in the form of minor bug fixes.
Pyret is a programming language that combines the best of functional and scripting languages to create a language for teaching and, perhaps down the road, general-purpose programming. Pyret is an umbrella for several efforts in compilation, type systems, error-reporting, language design, and much more.
The code repo is here.
